text: Chinnakkampalayam is a panchayat town in Erode district in the state of Tamil Nadu, India. ==Demographics== India census, Chinnakkampalayam had a population of 10,837. Males constitute 51% of the population and females 49%. Chinnakkampalayam has an average literacy rate of 52%, lower than the national average of 59.5%; with male literacy of 60% and female literacy of 44%. 9% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Erode district
title: Chinnakkampalayam
